project_name: SOFTWARE DESIGN PROJECT: BRINQA SLACK APP
responsibilities: Mastered a new tech stack, including Slack API (Bolt), TypeScript, and Docker
Led meetings to address blockers, align team progress, and meet sprint goals
Developed and managed an 8-week, 4-sprint plan, ensuring clear deliverables
Collaborated with Brinqa to set expectations and prevent scope creep
Developed front end web page using React JSX based on design specifications in Figma
Incorporated feedback from weekly meetings to iterate and improve upon work
Collaborated with the design team to estimate time frames for development

project_name: INTRO TO SOFTWARE ENGINEERING: PIX PAINT
description: Pixel art application created within the Godot Engine
responsibilities: Designed and implemented abstract canvas layering system, ensuring easily modifiable code
Served as Scrum Master, facilitating Agile Scrum ceremonies, while removing blockers, estimating work, and defining user stories with acceptance criteria
Created system calls to provide user-level processes with access to kernel-level functionalities
Designed and implemented a virtual memory management system, including page tables, lazy loading, effective eviction, demand paging, and growable stacks
Utilized Gnu DeBugger to diagnose complex issues such as synchronization

project_name: FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPMENT I: FINAL PROJECT
description: Web app incorporating account, workspace, channel, and message functionality of Slack
responsibilities: Utilized clean code practices to design modular frontend and backend architecture
Developed and tested front end using React JSX and Material UI, with unit tests created using Puppeteer, Vitest, React Testing Library, and Supertest
Implemented SQL databases with PostgreSQL and authentication using JWT tokens, utilizing RESTful and Open API for database interactions
Documented and visualized APIs with Swagger

description:
Sound Design and Implementation
Winner of the CITRIS 2023 Tech for Social Good Grant
Web application geared towards making Trauma Informed Yoga accessible remotely - allowing users to reconnect with their physical senses using a web camera.
responsibilities: Implemented generative sound effects using basic oscillators and modifiers within the Tone.js library and dynamic audio feedback to real time user interaction
Presented sound effect demos, translating feedback into practical improvements
Conducted interviews with yoga practitioners to better understand the psychological and physiological effects of sound in trauma-informed practices
